When the screen is off, press the volume key hold to vibrate and draw a left arrow in the air then release the volume key
Screen will be turned off, please press the volume key hold to vibrate when it's off then draw a left arrow in the air
Pleasepress the volume key hold to vibrate,follow the hint with a left arrow draw in the air,then release the volume key
